definition: (of handwriting) having the letters slanting backward, a return made with the back of the hand facing the direction of the stroke, to hit a tennis ball with the back of the racket
details:
adjective
- (of handwriting) having the letters slanting backward
= synonyms: left-slanting
- (of racket strokes) made across the body with back of hand facing direction of stroke
= synonyms: backhanded
noun
- a return made with the back of the hand facing the direction of the stroke
= synonyms: backhand stroke
verb
- to hit a tennis ball with the back of the racket
= example: to hit a tennis ball with the back of the racket
